dcterms:description: A dataset collected from large-scale data centers, published by Alibaba Cloud for PAKDD 2020 Alibaba AIOps Competition, containing millions of disks with monitoring metrics over a period of more than 16 months.
dcterms:title: Alibaba Cloud Dataset

dcterms:description: A public dataset published by Backblaze, based on the hard drives in Backblaze data center, containing over 90,000 disks with labels indicating their status.
dcterms:title: Backblaze Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset from Microsoft Azure used for predictive and adaptive failure mitigation to avert production cloud VM interruptions.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Azure Dataset
